english.segment1: All of me longs for You, Light of the world. Coming soon, breaking through all this pain. Falling down, calling out, Your love surrounding me.
english.segment2: For you I will wait, In you I will wait.
english.segment3: I will look to the day when you're coming again. To heal the hearts of men - when you come down. Let us look to the sky with redemption in our eyes. Watch the world come alive - when You come down
